escolha esta pasta
Local program and resources

If you wish to compile local BASIC! program and resources to APK, just copy to your target folder the needed files in their EXACT SAME folders and subfolders as on your Android device: your main .bas in "[b]XXX\rfo-basic\source\[/b]" and your resources in "[b]XXX\rfo-basic\data\[/b]" or whatever other folder you placed them in.
There are several cases where you would need to make an APK from a BASIC! program and resources that are *not* on your Android device: - you could type and develop directly on your computer, and test via the RFO-BASIC! Launcher - or RFO-BASIC! Quick APK could encounter problems communicating with your Android device via both WiFi and USB cable
Reminder: your target folder is at the following place:
Voltar
WiFi connection

You need to have the QuickAPK WiFi app installed on your Android device and running (either in foreground or background) with the WiFi activated.
Also, you need your computer and your Android phone or tablet to be on the same LAN (typically your home internet box) in order for them to auto-detect one another.
You can download the QuickAPK WiFi app for Android at:
Voltar
Conexão por cabo USB

Você precisar ter o modo "Depuração USB" ativado no seu aparelho: A partir do Android 4.2 e versões posteriores, isso pode ser feito indo para Config. > Sobre o telefone e clicando 7 times na linha do "número da versão" para ativar as Opções do desenvolvedor (Nas versões anteriores ao Android 4.2, o menu do desenvolvedor já está disponível na tela de config.). Depois vá para a opção do desenvolvedor e ative a depuração USB.
O seu dispositivo também precisa ser devidamente reconhecido pelo seu computador, ou seja, com os drivers do fabricante instalados. Geralmente isso significa instalar o programa de PC para isso (por exemplo Samsung Kies, Sony PC Companion, etc.)
Voltar

If you are unsure about the consequences, please consider unchecking the hardware acceleration...
